application.description: SimpleSafe App moving toward internet security, password generator SimpleSafe app is currently in its beta production. It is an application that instantaneously converts a simple phrase (such as 'hello') through a hash system (such as MD5 and SHA-1) into a fully secure password of your chosen length. This helps with password security because it translates simple passwords that we're used to such as Word382 into fully working, complex character/number hashes. You can copy the hashes over to your browser and make it all work.
application.name: SimpleSafe Application
